properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

parameters.description: The text or insertion point inside the paragraph that the cross reference points to. The insertion point is always adjusted to the beginning of the paragraph.
parameters.name: destination

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new ParagraphDestination (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the ParagraphDestination.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphDestinations within the specified range.

parameters.description: The ParagraphDestination, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ParagraphDestination, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The ParagraphDestination, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ParagraphDestination, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first ParagraphDestination in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last ParagraphDestination in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle ParagraphDestination in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the ParagraphDestination that follows the desired ParagraphDestination.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphDestination whose index follows the specified ParagraphDestination in the collection.

parameters.description: The ParagraphDestination whose index comes before the desired ParagraphDestination.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any ParagraphDestination in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every ParagraphDestination in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ParagraphDestination.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified index.
